item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, November 22, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Northvolt chief warns of faltering green transition after battery maker’s bankruptcy
2. Trump nominates Bondi for US attorney-general after Gaetz drops out
3. Jaguar boss defends ‘bold’ rebranding after backlash over video
4. [Opinion] Trump may be right about Ukraine’s endgame
5. [Opinion] Putin climbs escalatory ladder with missile experiment
